lead_paragraph: Nashville announced yesterday that it had signed goalie Tomas Vokoun to a four-year extension and given him the franchise’s richest contract at $22.8 million. Without Vokoun, who was out because of blood clots, the Predators lost in the opening round of the playoffs last spring.
